text: Bat-Mite is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics, commonly in association with the superhero Batman. Bat-Mite is an imp similar to the Superman villain Mister Mxyzptlk. == Fictional character biography == He is seen as a small, childlike man wearing a child-like Batman costume. Bat-Mite admires Batman and is seen more of an annoying character than a villain. == Powers and abilities == Bat-Mite possesses near-infinite magical powers and comes from another dimension, much like Mr. Mxyzptlk. ==References== Category:Batman characters
